item.title: WWW 0x08: 你的 Helm chart 安全嗎
item.description: organizations which design systems are constrained to produce designs which are copies of the communication structures of these organizations. – M. Conway 這裡是 WWW 第捌期，Wow Weihang Weekly 是一個毫無章法的個人週刊，出刊週期極不固定，從一週到五年都有可能。初期
